last_episode_to_air.name: Alis volat propriis
last_episode_to_air.overview: Tuomas finds out what Lundsten's treatment methods really mean. At the same time, an inspector arrives on the island and Dr. Lundsten is starting to get nervous.

name: Bad Apples
overview: Student activist Onerva is committed to an experimental psychiatric program for women at a 1970s sanatorium.

episodes.name: Sisters
episodes.overview: Onerva is sent against her will to a mental hospital. What does a young healthy student do among crazy women? However, Dr. Lundsten makes Onerva doubt her own sanity.

episodes.name: Buttercup
episodes.overview: Dr. Lundsten applies her therapy to Onerva and delves into her childhood experiences. Onerva's fellow patient Ritva entices Onerva to escape with her, but can a pathological liar be trusted?

episodes.name: Peace and Trust
episodes.overview: Dr. Lundsten hypnotizes Onerva and promises Onerva a home visit as a reward for the progress. At the hospital, Onerva meets her old professor, who tries to warn Onerva about the hospital's treatments.

episodes.name: Closer to Thee, My God
episodes.overview: Director Parvilinna visits the island and Onerva tries to get into a conversation with him. Vera and Onerva find out that there are no home visits from the island at all. Vera challenges Dr. Lundsten.

episodes.name: Högt i det blå
episodes.overview: Onerva tries to get a message to Vera's family that Vera is isolated and drugged. Dr. Lundsten makes progress in his research, succeeding in manipulating Serafina's memories.

episodes.name: Push
episodes.overview: A memorial service will be held on the island. Dr. Lundsten manages to make Onerva believe she is responsible for the death of another patient. Ritva is worried about Onerva and invites Onerva's husband to the island.

episodes.name: Grand mal
episodes.overview: Tuomas finds Onerva drugged and apathetic and wants to take her home. Lundsten manages to convince Tuomas that everything is fine. Ritva gets to see Dr. Lundsten's treatment method.

episodes.name: Alis volat propriis
episodes.overview: Tuomas finds out what Lundsten's treatment methods really mean. At the same time, an inspector arrives on the island and Dr. Lundsten is starting to get nervous.
